website_summaries.verdict: Simple-looking gloves that will do a great job. Very stretchable to allow your hand to flex easily.
pros: Smooth leather palm area ensures you won't have seams limiting your grip on the bat
Adjustable wrist strap is small but tough, meaning it'll stay in place nicely and hold up over time
Available in multiple colors and in a few different youth sizes
Good price point for batting gloves
Some kids will really like the simple design
cons: Gloves tend to run a little small
Adjustable wrist strap is small, making it tough to grab in a hurry

customer_reviews.title: Nice youth batting gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little batting gloves. I bought these for my son to help control the sting from mis-hits. He is 6 and has small hands, and the tee-ball size fits well. He has a hard time putting them on his hands but I think that is more his technique than the quality of the gloves. We'll see how they hold up, but they are so inexpensive that it's not too big of a concern.
customer_reviews.author: MAS1

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves for the price. Had a seam rip open on two different pairs after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Nice batting gloves, I love the feel. But I bought a pair in store and one on amazon and the gloves have a seam in the palm by the thumb corner of your palm. And both pairs popped that seam or the mesh back started ripping. But for the price they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves
customer_reviews.text: My third grader has weekly baseball clinics year round and was destroying himself by not wearing a glove. He loves this one and it fits nicely. Saved him from blisters!
customer_reviews.author: BPalmer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for 4 to 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for 4 to 5 year old and even has a little room to grow. Easy for my son to put on and take off on his own and he's happy they prevent blisters! My son is an average to slightly above average sized 4.5 year old and the gloves are slightly big on him but definitely wearable and work great.
customer_reviews.author: B K

customer_reviews.title: Finally a glove that fits and is leather
customer_reviews.text: Finally a glove that fits and is leather! I had to order a youth XL to get the correct fit but this one in this size actually fits my hand. I am a 70 year old woman and have to order a youth size glove to fit my wide palm and short fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Pat in So. Ore.

customer_reviews.title: No grip, slick glove
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered for my daughter to replace her old ones. She complains they are slick, and she cannot grip the bat well, she would rather use her old ones that are worn than these.. should have returned but waited to long, they look nice though
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality batting gloves.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 11 and these gloves were perfect for her. They feel a bit tight at first, but if you wear them to a couple of batting practices they break in very well and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jhens76

customer_reviews.title: No good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bough this glove for my son. He honestly used this a couple of time and it ripped on one of the fingers. First timé buying this brand for gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. I never write reviews, but trying to save someone the same hassle. Middle finger on the left hand had a hole up the entire seam right off the card. Son didn't even get to try on. We are returning. Note, the fingers are mesh and shoddy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. Larger than other model of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Son was happy.
customer_reviews.text: Son (age 10) was extreamly pleased with his batting gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight glove
customer_reviews.text: Great light glove especially for the hot summer seasons. I wish it were a little more skin tight around the fingers but overall great gloves for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Great batting gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my nephew for xmas gift. He love it. The glove quality is good
customer_reviews.author: TimeZ

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: We love Easton and these gloves did not disappoint. They fit my son perfectly and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new batting gloves. Fit was perfect and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my 9 year old son, but was buying for my 6 1/2 year old, so will need to return. But I have no doubt they would've held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough For The Little Guy!!
customer_reviews.text: They seems to run a little small but good for youth baseball! My son likes them
customer_reviews.author: Mr. JCM Sr.

customer_reviews.title: but quality is great. Go for a larger size than you would ...
customer_reviews.text: sizing is off, but quality is great. Go for a larger size than you would think you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Nemhauser

customer_reviews.title: These gloves did not even make it for 15 games ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves did not even make it for 15 games and had to be replaced. My daughter ended up having both palms rip out of her gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Roten

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Son likes them even though a little to big for his hand
customer_reviews.author: Matthew sanchou

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the fit and feel. The leather is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Falkenstern

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I alway have problems find gloves that fit his hand. these are great
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fits great,
customer_reviews.text: Have all brands and the only one my son likes.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Keller

customer_reviews.title: My son was very happy about our purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son was very happy about our purchase. its fits comfortably on his hands. My son is 11 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Immanuel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 6 and these gloves fit him great. It's been a struggle finding gloves in stores that fit him. He's so excited about these that he keeps putting them on around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Henry W Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Durability questions
customer_reviews.text: Son has used Easton batting gloves for years. This latest pair lasted a month before a couple fingers tore at the fingertips. Maybe a bad piece of leather...but disappointing non the less.
customer_reviews.author: Internet Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my son who is nine but on the small side. He loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel-Lyssa

product_meta.title: Easton Z3 Hyperskin Youth Batting Gloves
product_meta.description: Smooth goatskin palm with synthetic thumb Sublimated flexible 4-way stretch mesh 30mm neoprene band with branded pull tab
feature_bullets: Smooth goatskin palm with synthetic thumb
40mm neoprene band with branded pull tab
Right Hand Throw = Left Hand Glove, Left Hand Throw = Right Hand Glove
